page.title: 01NEWTON AYCLIFFE, CO. DURHAM
page.content: The area with which we are concerned comprises part of the new town of{Newton Aycliffe} and the village of{Middridge}and the hamlet of {Old Eldon.}The part of{Newton Aycliffe consists of mainly local authority built housing although much private housing development is taking place in the{Woodham}area which was once the site of a mediaeval village. {Woodham Burn}is a small stream running from the south-west in a north-easterly direction and is a tributary of the{River Skerne.} {Middridge}is a small village consisting of private housing. Many of the houses are of the large detatched executive type. The surrounding area is largely agricultural land.
